notes_translated.fr: La 4e édition de l'Atlas national du Canada (1974) contient une carte représentant l’emplacement des opérations d’extraction, les usines de traitement et le type de minéraux pour l’exploitation de minerais industriels de l’Est du Canada, en 1970. La carte principale est accompagnée d’une carte complémentaire à l’échelle de 1/30 000 000, montrant l’emplacement et les capacités annuelles des cimenteries en pourcentage de la capacité nationale totale, en 1970. On compte également plusieurs graphiques montrant la valeur de la production de ciment par province, en 1970, la valeur de la production de minéraux industriels (à l’exception des matériaux de construction), en 1970, la valeur de la production des matériaux de construction en 1970 et le volume de la production de minéraux industriels choisis, de 1886 à 1970.
notes_translated.en: Contained within the 4th Edition (1974) of the Atlas of Canada are two maps. The first map shows sites of extraction operations, sites of processing plants and mineral types for industrial mineral operations for Eastern Canada in 1970. The second map, whose scale is 1:30 000 000, shows the location and annual capacities for cement plants as a percentage of the total national capacity for cement operations in 1970. Several graphs also accompany and show the value of production of cement by province for 1970, the value of the production of industrial minerals (except structural materials) for 1970, the value of the production of structural materials for 1970 and the volume of selected industrial minerals for the period 1886 to 1970.

subject: economics_and_industry

The first map shows sites of extraction operations, sites of processing plants and mineral types for industrial mineral operations for Eastern Canada in 1970. The second map, whose scale is 1:30 000 000, shows the location and annual capacities for cement plants as a percentage of the total national capacity for cement operations in 1970. Several graphs also accompany and show the value of production of cement by province for 1970, the value of the production of industrial minerals (except structural materials) for 1970, the value of the production of structural materials for 1970 and the volume of selected industrial minerals for the period 1886 to 1970.
title: Industrial Minerals, Eastern Canada, 1970
